name: Acelive Broadcast File
summary: An ACELIVE file is a settings file created by ACE Stream, a peer-to-peer ((P2P)) media platform primarily used for streaming audio and video content, such as shows or broadcasts. It contains information about a broadcast, which includes the broadcast source and node information required by clients to connect to and playback a broadcast. ACELIVE files do not contain the actual broadcast media, only metadata about connecting to a broadcast.
